data.title: RocketBlocks: Notable McKinsey Alumni List
data.meta_description: Who are the most famous McKinsey & Co. alumni? This is our comprehensive, searchable list of famous McKinsey & Co. alumni, like Google CEO Sundar Pichai, Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg and Boeing CEO James McNerney.
data.text:
Notable McKinsey & Co. Alumni Database

Alumni samples | Curation criteria | McKinsey alumni table

Welcome to the Notable McKinsey & Co. Alumni Database project. It's a simple project we've put together to keep track of all the incredible McKinsey & Co. alumnus and what they're up to.

Here is a quick sample of McKinsey alumni leading impressive companies: (Top)

Sundar Pichai, the CEO of Alphabet (Google, YouTube, etc.)

James Gorman, the CEO of Morgan Stanley

Sheryl Sandberg, the COO of Facebook

Criteria for curating the Notable McKinsey alumni database: (Top)

Business: which McKinsey alumni are leading top global companies (eg, Google, Facebook, Boeing)

Start-ups: which McKinsey alumni have founded and leading hot startups (eg, The Muse)?

Government / non-profit: which McKinsey alumni are in leading government or non-profit positions (eg, Govenor on US Federal Reserve Board)?

Wild card: which McKinsey alumni have notable achievement in arts, culture or entertainment (eg, Winner of Survior: Cook Island)?

Searchable McKinsey & Co. alumni table (Top)

Add McKinsey alums

If you think there is someone who should be included, email us at support@rocketblocks.me with the subject "McKinsey notable alumni database" and let us know we're missing! Curious about Bain alums, check out our analgous BCG alumni database and Bain alumni database.

Recruiting for consulting?

Check out our free Getting Started Guide which covers key questions about the industry with information compiled from interviews with McKinsey, BCG and Bain alumni. We cover key topics such as:
